1.png.action: go straight 1 meter — bad action - lost target
1.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the table ahead. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target while keeping it centered in the frame.
The pile of 3 gray stones is visible and centered in the image. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

2.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
2.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is not visible in the current image.

3.png.action: go straight 1 meter — bad action - lost target
3.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible on the bench ahead. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.
The pile of 3 gray stones is visible but partially obscured by the bench. Moving up will provide a clearer view and help center the object in the frame.

4.png.action: target lost — return to previous position and try a different direction
4.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is not visible in the current image.

5.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is visible and centered in the image, but it is still some distance away. Moving straight will bring the drone closer to the target.

6.png.description: The pile of 3 gray stones is clearly visible, takes up a significant portion of the image, and appears very close with clear texture and detail. No further movement is necessary.
